seed_pair.known: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
seed_pair.target: Ella no quiere leer nada esta tarde.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Generated for S0035 with strict GATE compliance
Proper distribution: 2 short, 2 quite short, 2 longer, 4 long
All phrases use exact forms from taught LEGOs only

practice_phrases: I want to be able to read
he doesn't want to read Spanish

me gusta poder leer español tan pronto como pueda
